price: O  kâfirler: Bu Kur'an'ı dinlemeyin, okunurken gürültü yapın, belki bastırırsınız, demişlerdi.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
